Song.title: How Deep
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Stephen Altrogge Â© 2006 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| D G2/B | G2/B A | D G2/B | Bm A |]
Verse 1: [D]You were [G2]broken that [Bm]I might be [A]healed [D]You were [G2]cast off that [Bm]I might draw [A]near [D]You were [G2]thirsty that [Bm]I might come [A]drink [D/F#]Cried out in [G2]angui[2/4]sh [Bm7]that I mig[4/4]ht [Asus4 A]sing
Chorus: How [Em7 G2]deep is Your [D A/C#]love How [Em7]high and how [G2]wide is Your [D]mer[A]cy How [Em7 G2]deep is Your [D A/C#]grace Our [Em7]hearts over[Bm]flow with [Asus4]praise To [D G2/B | Bm A]You
Verse 2: [D]You knew [G2]darkness that [Bm]I might know [A]light [D]Wept great [G2]tears that [Bm]mine might be [A]dried [D]Stripped of [G]glory that [Bm]I might be [A]clothed [D/F#]Crushed by Your [G2]Father [2/4]to [Bm7]call me Yo[4/4]ur [Asus4 A]own
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 you were broken that i might be healed you were cast off that i might draw near you were thirsty that i might come drink cried out in anguish that i might sing chorus how deep is your love how high and how wide is your mercy how deep is your grace our hearts overflow with praise to you verse 2 you knew darkness that i might know light wept great tears that mine might be dried stripped of glory that i might be clothed crushed by your father to call me your own
